scripts.build: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode=production --node-env=production && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup.css && cp src/devtools/pane.css dist/pane.css
scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode=development && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup.css && cp src/devtools/pane.css dist/pane.css && npx tsc src/content.ts --outDir ./dist
